content: At the World Economic Forum in Davos, Jensen Huang, the CEO of Nvidia, made a point. Artificial intelligence, he said, is more likely to raise the value of blue-collar work. The claim is pretty familiar in parts of the labour debate. What makes it wo... [2133 chars]

title: Lawyer apologizes for AI-generated errors in murder case
description: A senior lawyer in Australia has apologized to a judge for filing submissions in a murder case that included fake quotes and nonexistent case judgments generated by artificial intelligence.
content:
MELBOURNE, Australia — A senior lawyer in Australia has apologized to a judge for filing submissions in a murder case that included fake quotes and nonexistent case judgments generated by artificial intelligence.

title: The biggest AI myths people still believe - and what’s actually true
description: Artificial Intelligence is seemingly taking over the world, but despite its popularity, there are plenty of myths that surround it.
content:
When it comes to AI, there is a lot of confusion floating around. Artificial Intelligence has seen a meteoric rise, and with it, rumors, myths and confused beliefs are bound to follow.
But separating truth from fact can be a challenge. When you’re pr... [4430 chars]

title: AI robot brings emotional care to pets
description: Tuya Smart introduces Aura, its first AI-powered companion robot for pets at CES 2026. The robot uses artificial intelligence to recognize behaviors and provide updates.
content:

title: European Union opens investigation into AI chatbot Grok over sexual deepfakes
description: European Union regulators on Monday opened a formal investigation into Elon Musk's social media platform X after his artificial intelligence chatbot Grok started spewing nonconsensual sexualized deepfake images on the platform. The scrutiny from Brussels comes after Grok sparked a global backlash by allowing users through its AI image generation…
